page.title: 05FARMING
page.content: FARMING IN STAUNTON ON WYE During the last 20 years farms have become fewer, larger, and more specialised and some smaller farms have been broken up with their houses and land sold to separate buyers. Hanmore farm, 245 acres has traditional mixed farming with mainly beef type cattle. Lower House Farm is split between Sun Valley Poultry who have large poultry house units and Bulmers of Hereford who have 160 acres of modern cider orchards. Oakchurch Farm is a successful PYO soft fruit farm with a white Charolais herd, fat lambs and corn. Kilkington(318a) all cereals with a 6 yr rotation and 2 broiler chicken units with birds bred, reared and killed on the farm for sale to South Wales Butchers.
